title: Online Learning Portal
description: Online Learning Portal is a comprehensive website designed for focused course-based learning.
functionality: Video page for viewing educational videos and submitting quizzes and assignments.
Once a quiz or assignment is submitted, students cannot retake it for that specific video.
Leaderboard showcasing the top 20 student marks for quizzes and assignments.
Admin panel for administrators to add videos, assignments, quizzes, and grade student submissions.

title: Grocery Stock
description: Grocery Stock is a sophisticated website that efficiently manages inventory and dealer information.
functionality: Implemented features to track product availability, sales, and delivery.
Allow dealer to add, delete, and update items.
Created a Sold information table page to track sales.
